column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I had already tried Giordano's
column2: wasn't too impressed. So we decided to go to Lou Malnati's. We ordered take-out because the place was PACKED!! I ordered a small deep dish with italian sausage and pepperoni. Apparently
column3: the italian sausage is most popular
column4: and really could see why. The size small is 9 inches
column6: and came out to be $13.50. REALLY!? $13.50?! soo cheap!!! i was seriously shocked at how much quality and taste was in the pizza for such a price!
